name: Totodile
flavorText:
Its well-developed
jaws are powerful
and capable of crushing anything.
Even its trainer
must be careful.

previous.name: Typhlosion
previous.flavorText:
If its rage peaks,
it becomes so hot
that anything that touches it will
instantly go
up in flames.

next.name: Croconaw
next.flavorText:
If it loses a
fang, a new one
grows back in its place. There are
always 48 fangs
lining its mouth.

pokemon.name: Totodile

jaws are powerful
and capable of crushing anything.
Even its trainer
must be careful.

pokemon.name: Feraligatr
pokemon.flavorText:
When it bites with
its massive and
powerful jaws, it shakes its head
and savagely tears
its victim up.
